title: Raising Monies with Funnies
desc: Join us for CannaKids' & SavingSophie.org's 1st Annual Comedy Fundraiser and Silent Auction! The night begins with networking and hand passed appetizers, featuring our item packed silent auction. Doors will open at 7pm with seating for our star studded comedy event beginning at 8pm, and the laughs will continue until just before 10pm.? HOST:   The show will be hosted by Actor John Cleese's daughter, the hilarious comedian, actress and writer, Camilla Cleese!? COMEDIANS: Jason Collings Brent Morin Follow us on Facebook for updates on what reknowned comedians you can expect to have tickle your funny bone! www.Facebook.com/MyCannaKids www.Facebook.com/SavingSophieFoundation 100% of the profits from this event will go to the CannaKids' families who have a child with cancer who desperately need assistance affording their medicine. ?So many children are struggling, and the financial burden families have to endure is unimaginable. ?With your help, we can bring relief to so many in need and give them the fighting chance they deserve!!? If you are interested in being a Sponsor or Donating a Silent Auction Item, please contact Dara Minchew at dara@savingsophie.org For Press Inquiries, please contact Tracy Ryan at tracy@cannakids.com A huge THANK YOU to our Sponsors!
